property.name: hadoop.kms.acl.CREATE
property.description: ACL for create-key operations. If the user does is not in the GET ACL, the key material is not returned as part of the response.

property.name: hadoop.kms.acl.ROLLOVER
property.description: ACL for rollover-key operations. If the user does is not in the GET ACL, the key material is not returned as part of the response.

property.name: hadoop.kms.acl.GET
property.description: ACL for get-key-version and get-current-key operations.

property.name: hadoop.kms.acl.GET_METADATA
property.description: ACL for get-key-metadata an get-keys-metadata operations.

property.name: hadoop.kms.acl.SET_KEY_MATERIAL
property.description: Complimentary ACL for CREATE and ROLLOVER operation to allow the client to provide the key material when creating or rolling a key.

property.name: hadoop.kms.acl.DECRYPT_EEK
property.description: ACL for decrypt EncryptedKey CryptoExtension operations
